name: uniexd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))

|- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c1))

comment: Deduction version of the ZF Axiom of Union in class notation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 26-Jun-2021.)
